page.title: 14LOCAL ISSUES
page.content: In the 1980's Langar _cum_ Barnstone was concered with 5 major issues. It was proposed to hold a Sunday market on the Airfield.This was turned down. The Coal Board proposed to sink a mine on the Airfield.This was fiercely opposed and eventually postponed. Several organisations wanted to start clubs on the Airfield like { {Parascending,Microlights and Gliding. These were curtailed. A new{tip}was proposed for the Railway cutting,and the present tip is to be extended to three times its present size.A new road would be built to divert traffic using the tip. {Severn Trent Water authority}wanted to charge residents for mains sewerage when cesspools were used.The charges were to be backdated.This was resolved.
